oneOf.description: Specifies the instantiation specification for the swapper impl.

ado_type.description: The ADO type. Used to retrieve the code id.

msg.description: The instantiate message encoded in base64.

allOf.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>. See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.

oneOf.description: Specifies the swapper impl by reference to an existing contract.

identifier.description: Can be either an address or identifier of an ADO in a app.
